artist: Artist: Jim Michaelson; Artist: Dave Schiller
description: red, floral text around a drawing of a short, fat airplane pieced together with panels, ladders, instruments, and other oddities; light green and yellow text at bottom; wood paneling background; verso: black and purple photograph of man sitting on ground behind a gravestone that read "Honey", with sleeping puppy in lap; black decorative corners and black border
provenance: Paul Maurer, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2019.
title: Jefferson Airplane, Fillmore Auditorium
